name: EMIMLIVE: Chroma Quest
description:
EMIMLIVE: Chroma Quest is a turn-based RPG in a black and white world. Control a full-bodied wrestler, a (mad?) scientist, and a guy with an oversized boomerang as you explore the game's dungeon and fight baddies along the way. Invert the colors of the game in-battle to change the heroes' classes on the fly (and find hidden objects while exploring).

(Made in 11 days for the Black and White Jam #8. The theme was "Loop".)

*Check the Controls screen in-game for a list of controls

**Progress is kept if you return to the title screen, as long as you don't close the game
